name: Midnight Runner (kintrix)
description:
Special thanks to
VOD.Music (Spotify)
for the BGM!

This game was made for the Spooktober Jam in 2 days. The jam was one week long, but since my first game idea was a failure, I only had two days for this.

Thank you Harman Kamboj,  , PixelMochii for hosting this great jam! I had a lot of fun making a Halloween game for it.

The optional theme was: Mask the Truth, which my game does not follow.
